name: Life is Pain
description:
Life is Pain is a 2D platformer with elements of hardcore, dynamic gameplay and abstract graphics in which you need to pass a variety of levels, playing as an alien.


The essence of this game is to complete a variety of levels and collect certain items, namely keys and puzzles. At each level there is a certain number of items, collecting which will open the door to a new level for you, but be careful at the level you will be waiting for traps and enemies that will prevent you from reaching the finish line and remember that you have only 3 lives for the whole game.After losing them all throughout the game, you will have to start all over from the beginning.



KEY FEATURES:
- Abstract graphics.
- Dynamic gameplay.
- 16 hardcore levels.
